configuration.title: KSP Compiler
configuration.python.location: Location of python executable. Default is "python" (searched via $PATH variable)
configuration.compiler.script: Path to the KSP compiler python script. Default is "ksp_compiler/ksp_compiler.py" (relative to workspace root)
configuration.compiler.force: Force all specified compiler options, overriding any compile_with pragma directives from the script
configuration.compiler.compact_variables: Shorten and obfuscate variable names in compiled code
configuration.compiler.combine_callbacks: Combine duplicate callbacks - but not functions or macros
configuration.compiler.extra_branch_opti: Add branch optimization checks earlier in compile process, allowing define constant based branching etc.
configuration.compiler.indent_size: Specifies how many spaces are used for indentation, if compact compiler option is not used
configuration.compiler.add_compile_date: Add current date comment at the beginning of compiled file
configuration.compiler.sanitize_exit_com: Add a dummy no-op command before every exit function call
configuration.validate.delay: Delay time to start validation in milliseconds. Set it to 0 to disable realtime checks.
command.compile: NI KSP: Run Compiler & copy script to clipboard
